CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Loop__Data_Mapping_Id__c ) , "None" , HYPERLINK("/" & Loop__Data_Mapping_Id__c , IF( ISBLANK( Loop__Data_Mapping_Name__c ) , "Mapping" , Loop__Data_Mapping_Name__c ) ) ) & " [" & HYPERLINK("/apex/loop__ddpEdit?type=dataMapping&cioId=" & Id , "Change" , "_self" ) & "]"
CustomField.label: Data Mapping
